Elizabeth "Liz" Allan - ★★★★★

Relationship: BEST FRIENDS FOREVER

Oh, Stars above. What a gal. How she did a complete 180° from bullying Virgil for years to becoming his absolute bestest friend (and only real friend, until college) is fucking beyond him, but he couldn’t be happier with Elizabeth’s existence. Through thick and thin, they’ve persevered to the point where he feels nauseous about potentially endangering her.
